title: Haunted Zyra Skin Bug
body: When you Q/E a seed, their auto attacks are the same as the classic skin plant's auto attacks. Would be nice to see it fixed! :D

replies.body:
Hey Star Nazura,

We have a fix for this issue, so you should be seeing the proper particles on live soon. :D
Thank you! It's one of my favorite skins and I was sad to see the bug. Thanks for the reply though!
You're welcome! :] (I can't say I blame you, it's the only Zyra skin I play, haha.)

they are aware of the skin bug and are working on a fix

not sure when it will be out though
